                                            <span>Question 1 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>হাইড্রোজেন ও অক্সিজেনের একক আয়তনে অণুর সংখ্যার অনুপাত 3:7&nbsp;হলে, তাদের গড় মুক্তপথের অনুপাত কত হবে?</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো গ্যাসের একটি অণুর ভর 0.003g&nbsp;এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="width: 2.163em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1001.75em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-60"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-62"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.82em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm1m^3</script></span> আয়তনে অণুসংখ্যা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="width: 6.298em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.143em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.194em, 1005.14em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-66"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-68" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.79em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-70"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-71"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-73"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-74"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-76"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.132em, 1001.16em, 4.361em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-77"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-78"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-79"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-80"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm 3\times{10}^{11}{/C}^2</script></span> হলে, বায়ুমন্ডলীয় চাপ কত? [C&nbsp;হচ্ছে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="width: 2.684em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-85"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-87"><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.003</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="width: 32.297em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>5 টি গ্যাস অণুর বেগ যথাক্রমে&nbsp;v, 2v, 3v, 4v, 5v হলে, গ্যাস অণুগুলোর গড় বর্গবেগ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>11</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="width: 2.416em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-227" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo accent=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="width: 13.895em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1007.83em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 7.83em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo accent="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm {\overline{C^2}}=\frac{v^2+4v^2+9v^2+16v^2+25v^2}{5}=11v^2 </script></span></p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="width: 9.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.08em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-270"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">T</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm PV=nRT\Rightarrow PV\propto T</script></span>&nbsp;যা একটি সরলরৈখিক সম্পর্ক।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কত ডিগ্রি সেলসিয়াস তাপমাত্রায় অক্সিজেন অণুর গড় বর্গবেগের বর্গমূল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>272</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="width: 4.212em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.43em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.36em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-283"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-285"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.939em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1001.46em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">272</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.492em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>272</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm -272^\circ C</script></span> তাপমাত্রায় হাইড্রোজেন অণুর গড় বর্গবেগের বর্গমূলের সমান হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.22em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1002.5em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -5.203em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 1.805em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm \sqrt{\frac{3RT_{O_2}}{M_{O_2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{3RT_{H_2}}{M_{H_2}}}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>257</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="width: 18.732em; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-405"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.48em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">257</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.518em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>257</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm\therefore T_{O_2}=\frac{T_{H_2}\times M_{O_2}}{M_{H_2}}=\frac{1\times32}{2}=16K=-257^\circ C </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বায়ুমন্ডলীয় চাপ কত হলে, 10m&nbsp;গভীর হ্রদের তলদেশে উৎপন্ন বুদবুদ হ্রদের পৃষ্ঠে আয়তনে দ্বিগুণ হয়ে যাবে? [<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="width: 6.149em; পানির ঘনত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1331</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="width: 8.459em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-422"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ρ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">1331</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-429"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.827em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.82em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-431"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-432"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ρ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1331</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm \rho=1331\ kgm^{-3}</script></span>]</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>133.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="width: 5.194em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.237em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1004.24em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-450"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">133.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>133.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm 133.1\ kPa </script></span></p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>যেকোনো বায়ুমন্ডলীয় চাপের জন্যই দ্বিগুণ হয়ে যাবে</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="width: 17.174em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1014.06em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-457"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-465"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ρ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ρ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi>ρ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi>ρ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm P\times2V=\left(P+h\rho g\right)V\Rightarrow2P=P+h\rho g</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1331</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>133100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>133.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-482" style="width: 24.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.674em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1019.67em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-483"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ρ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1331</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">133100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">133.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi>ρ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1331</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>133100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>133.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm \Rightarrow P=h\rho g=10\times1331\times10=133100\ Pa=133.1\ kPa</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো গ্যাসের RMS বেগ C। যদি গ্যাসটির তাপমাত্রা তিনগুণ বৃদ্ধি করা হয়। তাহলে RMS বেগ কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>2C</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="width: 2.507em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.01em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-509"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.46em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-510"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.6em, 1000.5em, 3.918em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.053em, 1000.87em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.051em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm \sqrt2C </script></span></p>
</label>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো একদিন ঢাকা ও চট্টগ্রামে প্রতি ঘনমিটার বায়ুর চাপ যথাক্রমে&nbsp;2 atm এবং 6 atm। উভয় স্থানের তাপমাত্রার অনুপাত কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="width: 11.109em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="width: 14.756em;                                         <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 80px; height: 72px;"><br>
নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>&gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm V_3>V_2>V_1 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-745" style="width: 7.561em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-758" style="width: 7.561em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="width: 4.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.732em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1003.69em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-772"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-773"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-778"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-779" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm \frac{P}{T}=\frac{nR}{V}=</script></span>&nbsp;ধ্রুবক। ধ্রুবক যত ছোট হবে V তত বড় হবে।&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>20℃ তাপমাত্রায় আপেক্ষিক আর্দ্রতা 50% হলে, শিশিরাঙ্ক কত? [9℃, 10℃ এবং&nbsp;20℃ তাপমাত্রায় সম্পৃক্ত জলীয় বাষ্পের চাপ যথাক্রমে 9 mm, 10 mm এবং 18 mm Hg]</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>9℃</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>9.25℃</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>50</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="width: 10.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1008.98em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-784"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-785" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-788" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-789" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-790" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">18</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>50</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm P=\frac{50}{100}\times18=9\ mm\ Hg</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;9℃ তাপমাত্রায় সম্পৃক্ত বাষ্প চাপ 9 mm Hg।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>2 atm চাপে কোনো গ্যাসের ঘনত্ব <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="width: 5.069em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.137em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.14em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-801"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-806"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.26em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.263em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-808"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-809"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-810" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-811" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="width: 22.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.732em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1018.73em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-861"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-862"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.66em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-874"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ρ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-876" style="font-size: 50%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-878" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-882" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-886"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-896" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-902"><span style="display: inline-block;
