width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-904"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-905"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-913"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-915"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-916"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-917" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-918" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\rm \frac{P_1}{P_2}=\frac{\rho_1}{\rho_2}\Rightarrow\rho_2=\frac{P_2}{P_1}\times\rho_1=\frac{4}{2}\times1.5\ gml^{-1}=3\ gml^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <p>কোনো গ্যাস কর্তৃক প্রদত্ত চাপ 2Pa&nbsp;এবং গ্যাসের গতিশক্তি যদি 3600J হয়, তবে গ্যাস কর্তৃক দখলকৃত আয়তন কত?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1460</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-937" style="width: 4.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1003.28em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-938"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1460</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-940"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.82em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-941" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-942" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1460</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm 1460m^3 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>3600</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1200</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-943" style="width: 21.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1017.26em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-944"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-945" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-947" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-948" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-951"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-953" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-954" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-955" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-957" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-961" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-962" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-963" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-970" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3600</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-971" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-972"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1200</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-977"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-979" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>3600</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1200</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-55">\rm P=\frac{2}{3}\ \frac{E}{V}\therefore V=\frac{2}{3}\times\frac{E}{P}=\frac{2}{3}\times\frac{3600}{2}m^3=1200m^3 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <span>Question 16 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি মৃদু তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষ্য?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="width: 3.554em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="width: 6.013em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>গলিত NaCl এর মধ্য দিয়ে 1F বিদ্যুৎ চালনা করলে ক্যাথোডে কী পরিমাণ সোডিয়াম জমা হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>23</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-998" style="width: 9.51em; mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow></mrow><mn>0</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.76</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.44</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>0.32</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\rm E_{cell}^0=E_{{Zn}/{Zn^{2+}}}^0+E_{{Fe^{2+}}/{Fe}}^0=-\left(-0.76\right)+\left(-0.44\right)=+0.32\ V </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ধাতুর দ্রবণ চাপ P এবং ধাতব আয়নযুক্ত দ্রবণের অভিস্রবণ চাপ P° হলে, কোন ক্ষেত্রে কোনো তড়িৎদ্বার বিভব সৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা থাকে না?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচে চারটি ধাতুর প্রমাণ বিজারণ বিভব দেওয়া আছে। কোনটি সবচেয়ে ভালো বিজারক?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1.9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="width: 3.463em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.826em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.83em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1225"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.058em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>1.9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm -1.9V </script></span></p>

                                            </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3600</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>90000</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="width: 15.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1012.58em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1244"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">I</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3600</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm Zn(s)/Zn^{2+}(aq)||Cu^{2+}(aq)/Cu(s)</script></span> ;&nbsp;কোষটির emf&nbsp;বাড়াতে নিম্নের কোনটি উপযুক্ত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1002.09em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1361"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Z</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1364"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1366"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1367"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\rm[Zn^{2+}] </script></span>&nbsp;হ্রাস ও তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধি।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msubsup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.303</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="width: 11.6em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <span>Question 26 </span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 27 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>25°C তাপমাত্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.0</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="width: 6.895em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5.0</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="width: 6.895em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1436"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5.0</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1443"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5.0</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\rm 5.0M\ AgNO_3</script></span> দ্রবণে একই পরিমাণ বিদ্যুৎ প্রবাহ একই সময় ধরে চালনায় কী পরিমাণ Ag জমা হবে?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ইপসম লবণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mn>.7</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="width: 7.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1005.58em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1447"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1448"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1450"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1454"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.7</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1458"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1460" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mn>.7</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm \left(MgSO_4.7H_2O\right)\ </script></span>&nbsp;এ Mg&nbsp;থাকে।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>24</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="width: 13.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1010.99em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1465"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1469" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.15em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.572em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1470"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1471" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1472" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1474"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1475" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1476" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.31em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1478" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.059em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.89em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.965em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1479"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1480" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">24</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1481" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1482" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1483" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1484" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1485"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">96500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.06em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.059em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">24</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>24</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>96500</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">\rm \therefore W=\frac{MIt}{nF}=\frac{24\times2\times96500}{2\times96500}=24g</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ভিনেগার প্রস্তুতিতে ইস্টের বৃদ্ধিতে সহায়তা করে কোনটি?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="width: 3.554em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.917em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.92em, 2.507em, -999.998em);                             <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1536" style="width: 19.749em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.327em, 1000.59em, 4.283em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1591" style="width: 17.584em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1616" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.207em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1004.59em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.375em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1617"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1618" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1625" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1626" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1004.96em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.539em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1633"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1634" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1635" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1640"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1641"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1642" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1643" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1644" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1645" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1646" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">28</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1647"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1648"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1649" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.21em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.207em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>17</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>28</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-97">\rm tan45°=tan(17°+28°)=\frac{tan17°+tan28°}{1-tan17°tan28°}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1650" style="width: 17.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1014.02em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1651"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1659"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1660"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">28</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1666"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1667"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1674"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1675"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">28</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1682"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1683"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\rm \Rightarrow1-tan17°tan28°=tan17°+tan28°</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1685" style="width: 17.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1014.47em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1686"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1692"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1693"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">28</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1700"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1701"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1708"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1709"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">28</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1716"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1717"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>17</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>28</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">\rm \Rightarrow tan17°.tan28°+tan17°+tan28°=1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>30</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1783" style="width: 20.658em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1784"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1785" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>30</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">\rm b=c\cos{A}+a\cos{C}=\sqrt3\ cos60°+3×cos\ 30°</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1823" style="width: 13.527em;
