top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1848" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1851"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1852"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm =\sqrt3\times\frac{1}{2}+\frac{3\sqrt3}{2}=\frac{4\sqrt3}{2}=2\sqrt3</script></span></p>

<p>অথবা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2220;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2220;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2220;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1854" style="width: 12.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.45em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1855"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∠</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">180</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1860"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1861"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1864" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1865"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∠</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1869" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1870"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∠</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1875"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1876"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">∠</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>∠</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>∠</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\rm \angle B=180°-∠A-∠C=90°</script></span></p>

<p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-110-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1878" style="width: 10.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.65em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1008.65em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1879"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1880"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1881" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.56em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1882"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1883" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1884" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1885" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1886"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1887" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1889" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1890" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.52em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1891"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1892" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1893" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1894" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-110">\rm \frac{a}{\sin{A}}=\frac{b}{sin\ B}\Rightarrow b=2\sqrt3</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            <p>ত্রিভুজ&nbsp;ABC এ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>:</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>:</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="width: 9.205em;                                             <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1923" style="width: 5.057em; top: -2.32em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1924"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1925"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.325em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1937" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1938" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1959" style="width: 10.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.45em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1960"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1961" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2220;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="width: 16.682em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.67em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.674em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2029" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2030"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2031" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2032" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2033" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">∠</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\rm \cos{\angle C}=\frac{a^2+b^2-c^2}{2ab}=\frac{4k^2+9k^2-16k^2}{2\times2k\times3k}=\frac{-1}{4}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2220;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2034" style="width: 8.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1006.97em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2035"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2036" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∠</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2038" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2040" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2042"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2043"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2044" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2045" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2046"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2047" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2048"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2049"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2050" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2051"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2053"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2054" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2055" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2056" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∠</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">\rm \therefore\angle C=\cos^{-1}{\left(-\frac{1}{4}\right)}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mn>19</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2112" style="width: 3.463em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2113"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">19</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2118"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2119"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">\rm \frac{cos26°-\ cos64°}{cos26°+cos64°}=\frac{2sin45°sin19°}{2cos45°cos19°}=tan19°</script></span></p>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ABC ত্রিভুজের,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2202" style="width: 11.067em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.056em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1008.98em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2203"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2205"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2206" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2207"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2211"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2212" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2213"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2217"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2218" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2219"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">\rm \cos{A}+\cos{C}=\sin{B}</script></span>&nbsp;হলে, ত্রিভুজটির নাম কী?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমবাহু</p>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমকোণী</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সূক্ষকোণী</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>স্থূলকোণী</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2221" style="width: 9.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1007.46em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2222"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2224"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2225" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2226"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2230"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2231" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2232"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2236"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2237" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2238"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">\rm \cos{A}+\cos{C}=\sin{B}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2240" style="width: 15.904em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2241"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2280" style="width: 21.477em; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2312" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.559em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2313"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2314" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2315" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2316" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2317" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.56em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.559em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2318" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">]</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2320" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.56em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2321"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2322" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2323" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2324" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2325" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2327" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2328" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2329" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>∵</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">\rm \Rightarrow\cos{\frac{A-C}{2}=\cos{\frac{B}{2}}}\left[\because\frac{A+C}{2}=\frac{\pi-B}{2}\right]\Rightarrow\frac{A-C}{2}=\frac{B}{2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2330" style="width: 21.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1017.22em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2331"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">\rm \Rightarrow A-C=B\Rightarrow A=B+C\Rightarrow A+B+C=2A</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2353" style="width: 8.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1007.05em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2354"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2356" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2360" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2363" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2364" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2365" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-129">\rm \Rightarrow\pi=2A\therefore A=\frac{\pi}{2} </script></span>&nbsp;[ত্রিভুজটি সমকোণী]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>15</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>15</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2366" style="width: 7.863em; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 4.696em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">?</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.589em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.775em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>15</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>15</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-130">\rm \frac{cos75°+cos15°}{cos75°-cos15°}=? </script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2604" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2605" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">180</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2606"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2607"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2611"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2612"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2617"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2618"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>75</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>120</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-136">\rm =\frac{tan45°+tan75°}{1-tan45° tan75°}=tan(45°+75°)=tan120°=tan(180°-60°)=-\sqrt3</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পদসংখ্যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-138-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>180</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2650" style="width: 7.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1005.95em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2651"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2652" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2653" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.3em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2654"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2655" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">180</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2656" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2657" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2658" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.42em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>180</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-138">\rm =\frac{180-30}{30}+1=6</script></span>।</p>

<p>3 জোড়া পদ&nbsp;;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-139-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2663" style="width: 9.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.46em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2664"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2666" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∵</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2667" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2669" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2670"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2671" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2672"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2673" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2675" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2677" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2678"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2679" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2680"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2681" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>∵</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-139">\rm [\because\cos^2{\theta}+\sin^2{\theta}=1]</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2685" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2686"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2687" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-140">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;রাশির মান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2688" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.53em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2689"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-141">=1+1+1=3</script></span>&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-147-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2753" style="width: 21.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.871em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1017.79em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2754"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2757" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;
