overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">}</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cot</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2783"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2785" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-147">\rm cotC=\cot{\left\{\pi-(A+B)\right\}}\Rightarrow cotC=-\cot(A+B)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-148-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2789" style="width: 9.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1008.08em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2790"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2798"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -2.006em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2799"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2800" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2801" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2806" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2807" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.719em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2811"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2812" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2813" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2814" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.1em, 1.191em, -999.998em); border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-148">\rm \Rightarrow cotC=-\frac{cotA\ cotB-1}{cotA+cotB}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-149-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2821" style="width: 19.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1015.82em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2822"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2836" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2837" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2840" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2841" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2845" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-149">\rm \Rightarrow cotA\ cotC+cotC\ cotB=-cotA\ cotB+1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-150-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2856" style="width: 18.65em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.289em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1015.21em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2857"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-150">\rm \Rightarrow cotA\ cotB+cotB\ cotC+cotC\ cotA=1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2946" style="width: 1.368em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>sec</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-157">\rm \frac{tan\theta+\sec(-\theta)}{cot\theta+cosec(-\theta)}=\frac{tan\theta+sec\theta}{cot\theta-cosec\theta}=\frac{-\frac{5}{12}-\frac{13}{12}}{-\frac{12}{5}-\frac{13}{5}}</script></span></p>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>18</mn></mrow><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-158">\rm =\frac{-5-13}{12}\times\frac{5}{-12-13}=\frac{-18}{12}\times\frac{5}{-25}=\frac{3}{10}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 40 </span>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-166-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>75</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3171" style="width: 12.625em; style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3263"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3264"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3265" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">\rm \frac{c}{sinC}=\frac{b}{sinB}\Rightarrow\frac{c}{b}=\frac{sin C}{sinB}=\frac{sin60°}{sin45°}=\frac{\frac{\sqrt3}{2}}{\frac{1}{\sqrt2}}=\frac{\sqrt3}{\sqrt2}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-171-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3302" style="width: 22.01em; -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3415"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3416" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3417" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3418" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3420" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.17em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3421"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3422" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3423" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3424" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3425" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3426" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3427"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3428" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3429" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3430" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-172">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{a+b+c-a-c}{(a+b+c)(a+c)}=\frac{2b+2c-a-b-c}{(a+b+c)(b+c)}\Rightarrow\frac{b}{a+c}=\frac{b+c-a}{b+c}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3431" style="width: 20.412em; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-173">\rm \Rightarrow b^2+bc=ab+bc+c^2-a^2\Rightarrow\frac{a^2+b^2-c^2}{2ab}=\frac{1}{2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-174-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2220;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3476" style="width: 15.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1012.3em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3477"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3482" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3484" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3486" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3492"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3493"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3495" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3496" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3497"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∠</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3499" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3502"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3503"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>∠</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-174">\rm \Rightarrow cosC=\frac{1}{2}=cos60°∴∠C=60°</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3519" style="width: 15.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1012.95em, 2.83em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3520"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3521"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3522" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.52em, 4.428em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3523"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3524" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3525" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3526" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3527"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.691em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3528" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3529" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.41em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.412em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3540" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3541"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3542"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3543" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3544" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3547"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3548"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-178">\rm \frac{a}{sin\frac{\pi}{3}}=2R\Rightarrow a=2\times2\times\frac{\sqrt3}{2}=2\sqrt3</script></span></p>

<p>পরিসীমা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-179-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3550" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.35em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3551"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3557"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3558"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-179">\rm=3a=6\sqrt3</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 43 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-180-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3560" style="width: 10.136em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>15</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>75</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>15</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-192-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3740" style="width: 20.248em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3772" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3773"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-192">\rm y=tan60°+2\ sin30°=\sqrt3+2\times\frac{1}{2}=\sqrt3+1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 45 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-193-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>55</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>35</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3777" style="width: 13.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.732em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1010.66em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3778"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">55</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3783"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3784"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3785" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3799"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3800"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">?</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>55</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>35</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-193">\rm sin55°.sec35°.cos45°=? </script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-198-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>55</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>35</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>35</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>35</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3838" style="width: 19.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1016.19em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3839"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3840" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3841" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">55</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3844"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3845"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">35</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3852"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3853"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3860"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3861"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">35</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3876"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3877"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3884"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3885"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>55</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>35</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>35</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>35</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-198">\rm sin55°.sec35°.cos45°=cos35°.sec35°.cos45°</script></span></p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Cnidaria</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Platyheminthes</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Chordata</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>কোষীয় মাত্রার গঠন → Porifera<br>
কোষ-টিস্যু মাত্রার গঠন → Cnidaria<br>
টিস্যু-অঙ্গ মাত্রার গঠন → Platyhelminthes<br>
অঙ্গ-তন্ত্র মাত্রার গঠন → Nemartean</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                <h2>Bangla (15)</h2>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
