</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>মৃত্যুঞ্জয়ের</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আত্মীয়র</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">জেনে রাখো: ন্যাড়া মৃত্যুঞ্জয়কে দেখতে তার কুটুরিতে গিয়েছিল। সেখান থেকে ফেরার পথে রাত হয়ে যাওয়ায় বিলাসী তাকে প্রদীপ হাতে এগিয়ে দিতে আসে কুড়ি-পচিঁশ বিঘা আমের বাগানে। বাগান এতটাই অন্ধকার ছিলো যে নিজের হাতটি পর্যন্ত দেখা যাচ্ছিল না। তাই বিলাসী উৎকণ্ঠিত মুখ নিয়ে ন্যাড়াকে লক্ষ্য করে এই কথাটি বলেছিলো।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কবি ও তাঁর ভক্তের মধ্যে সংলাপ বিনিময়ের মাধ্যমে কবিতাটিতে মনের ভাব আদান-প্রদান হয়।</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিম্&zwnj;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>আন ও উন খাঁটি বাংলা উপসর্গ এবং নিম্ হচ্ছে বিদেশি উপসর্গ।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 81 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">Which of the following is the correct conversion of this compound sentence to simple sentence using a prepositional phrase –“He was terrible unhappy but did not blame the girl.”</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>In spite of being terribly unhappy, he did not blamed the girl.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>In spite in being terrible unhappy, he did not blame the girl.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>In spite on being terribly unhappy, he do not blame the girl.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>In spite of being terribly unhappy, he did not blame the girl.</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>In spite of is used to link two. contrasting ideas or show that one fact makes the other fact surprising.&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 82 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Which indirect speech is correct?</p>

<p>The man said, “Good morning, my friend.”</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>The man said his friend good morning.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>The man told his friend good morning.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>The man wished good morning to his friend.</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>The man prayed his friend good morning.</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

    <div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        
        <h2 style="font-size: 25px;">Written Master Set: 1 (Question &amp; Solution)</h2>
    </div>
            <div class="TakeExamBody">
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 153px;"></p>

			<p>সমভরের গ্যাসদ্বয় সমচাপ প্রক্রিয়ার মধ্য দিয়ে যাচ্ছে। x&nbsp;গ্যাসের আণবিক ভর কত?</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>350</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 4.756em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.86em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-5" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.48em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">350</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.518em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>350</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm T=350^\circ C</script></span>&nbsp;তে, P,T,m উভয় গ্যাসের জন্য সমান।</p>

<p>তাহলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-9" style="width: 15.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.26em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-10"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-11" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-12" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-13" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-14" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-15" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-17" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-20"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.15em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.15em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.572em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-26"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.31em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-31" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm PV=nRT\Rightarrow\frac{P}{RT}=\frac{m}{MV}\Rightarrow MV=</script></span>&nbsp;ধ্রুবক</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>24</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>28</mn></mrow><mn>336</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="width: 19.264em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-34"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-36" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-39"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-46"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-68"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-69"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="width: 6.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.289em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.29em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-73"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-74"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.904em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-77"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-84"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm M_1V_1=M_2V_2</script></span> লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
মান বসানোর জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="width: 6.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.37em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-88"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-89"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.904em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-98"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-100"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-101"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <strong>[বি.দ্র: </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও গ্রহণযোগ্য হবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>

		<tr>
			<td>
			<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 82px;"></p>

			<p>B বিন্দুতে আয়তন পরিবর্তনের হার <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="width: 3.392em;                                         <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>B বিন্দুতে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="width: 11.969em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="width: 17.912em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">V</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-169"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-170"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-173"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm PV=K\Rightarrow\frac{d\left(PV\right)}{dt}=0\Rightarrow P\frac{dV}{dt}+V\frac{dP}{dt}=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="width: 9.961em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-179"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm \Rightarrow12\times2+2\times\frac{dP}{dt}=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="width: 21.355em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="width: 3.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.08em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-245"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-246"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-248" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm V_B=2L</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="width: 7.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1005.7em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-253"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-255"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-256"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-257" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-258" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-259"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-260" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">V</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-264"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-265"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-268"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm P\frac{dV}{dt}+V\frac{dP}{dt}=0\ </script></span>; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
মান বসানোর জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="width: 9.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1007.83em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-275"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-276"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-277"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-280"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-288"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-289"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-291" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-294"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-299" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm \frac{dP}{dt}=-12\times{10}^3Pas^{-1}</script></span>&nbsp;;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও গ্রহণযোগ্য হবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="text-align: justify;">কুমিল্লায় কোনো স্থানের একটি ঘরের তাপমাত্রা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-300" style="width: 2.982em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.424em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.35em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-301"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-303"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.933em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.41em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 0.486em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm -1^\circ C</script></span>। ঐ ঘরে 250 mole বায়ু আছে। ঘরটিতে একটি Helium এর সিলিন্ডার ছিল যার গাত্র অন্তরক পদার্থ দিয়ে তৈরি। সিলিন্ডার এ 27℃ এ 50 mole Helium ছিল। ঘটনাক্রমে সিলিন্ডার এর মুখ খুলে গেল। ফলে Helium গ্যাস বায়ুর সাথে মিশে গেল। মিশ্রিত পরিবেশে পানি কোন ভৌত অবস্থায় থাকবে?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">300</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>272</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>300</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm E_i=E_f=250\times\frac{5}{2}\times R\times272+50\times\frac{3}{2}\times R\times300</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="width: 13.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1011.39em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-337"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.207em;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm =250\times\frac{5}{2}\times RT+\frac{3}{2}\times50\times RT</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>272</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>300</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>50</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>275</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="width: 21.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.912em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1017.87em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-357"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -4.219em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-362"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">272</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1005.17em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.621em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-378"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-size: 70.7%;
