font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1008.57em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 8.568em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">275</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>272</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>300</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>50</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>275</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm \Rightarrow T=\frac{(250\times5\times272)+(50\times3\times300)}{(250\times5)+(3\times50)}=275K=2^\circ C>0^\circ C</script></span></p>

<p>তাহলে, পানি তরল অবস্থায়ই বিদ্যমান থাকবে।<br>
<strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong>&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.75em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-404"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-405"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm E_i=E_f</script></span> ; লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
মান বসানোর জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
T = 2℃ ; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
“পানি তরল অবস্থায়ই বিদ্যমান থাকবে।”&nbsp;লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও গ্রহণযোগ্য হবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>0.076m পারদ স্তম্ভ চাপে এবং 39℃ তাপমাত্রায় কোনো গ্যাসের আয়তন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>312</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="width: 7.304em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.963em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1005.96em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-413"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">312</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-417"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-418"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-420"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-421"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-424"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>312</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm 312\times{10}^{-4}m^3</script></span>। প্রমাণ চাপ ও তাপমাত্রায় গ্যাসের আয়তন কত?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.076</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>312</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>312</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>273</mn><mn>0.76</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>0.076</mn><mn>0.76</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="width: 20.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1017.17em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-477"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2.73</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="width: 10.453em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong>&nbsp;<br>

vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm \frac{P_1V_1}{T_1}=\frac{P_2V_2}{T_2}</script></span>&nbsp;; লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
মান বসানোর জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2.73</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="width: 8.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1007.17em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-569"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-570"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.73</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-577"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-578"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-581"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-584"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2.73</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm V_2=2.73\times{10}^{-3}m^3</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও গ্রহণযোগ্য হবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="text-align: justify;">Fe তড়িৎদ্বারযুক্ত দুটি তড়িৎকোষের একটিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="width: 2.573em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.088em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.09em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-588"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-590"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.41em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-592"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-593"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm Fe^{2+}</script></span> এর লবণের দ্রবণ ও অপরটিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-596" style="width: 2.573em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.088em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.09em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-597"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-599"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.41em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-601"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-602"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-604" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm Fe^{3+}</script></span> এর লবণের দ্রবণ আছে। কোষ দুটিকে শ্রেণি সমবায়ে যুক্ত করে একটি নির্দিষ্ট সময় ধরে তড়িৎপ্রবাহ চালনা করলে কোষের ক্যাথোডে জমাকৃত ধাতুর পরিমাণের সঠিক অনুপাত নির্ণয় কর।</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>মনে করি, প্রবাহিত তড়িৎ এর&nbsp;পরিমাণ x&nbsp;ফ্যারাডে।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-605" style="width: 6.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.62em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-606"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-608"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-610"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-611"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-612" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-613" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm Fe^{2+}+2e\rightarrow Fe</script></span></p>

<p>2F তড়িৎ প্রবাহ চালনা করলে জমাকৃত লোহা&nbsp;= 55.85g</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-620" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-621"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="width: 1.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.95em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-624"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm xF</script></span>&nbsp;তড়িৎ প্রবাহ চালনা করলে জমাকৃত লোহা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>55.85</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-627" style="width: 2.912em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.38em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-628"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.54em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.268em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-630"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">55.85</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.67em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.666em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>55.85</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm\frac{55.85\times x}{2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-635" style="width: 7.502em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-652" style="width: 0.658em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="width: 0.658em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="width: 0.658em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>55.85</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>:</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>55.85</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="width: 10.945em; <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="width: 6.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.62em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-698"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-700"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-702"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-703"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\rm Fe^{2+}+2e\rightarrow Fe</script></span> লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
xF তড়িৎ প্রবাহ চালনা করলে জমাকৃত লোহা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>55.85</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="width: 2.912em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.38em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-713"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-714"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.54em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.268em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-715"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">55.85</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-718" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.67em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.666em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>55.85</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm \frac{55.85\times x}{2}</script></span> লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="width: 7.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1006.11em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-721"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-723"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-725"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-726"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-727" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-731"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm Fe^{3+}+3e^-\rightarrow Fe</script></span> লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
xF তড়িৎ প্রবাহ চালনা করলে জমাকৃত লোহা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>55.85</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="width: 4.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.28em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-738"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.54em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.268em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-741"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-742" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">55.85</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-743" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-745" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.67em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.666em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>55.85</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm =\frac{55.85\times x}{3}</script></span> লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
জমাকৃত লোহার পরিমাণের অনুপাত = 3:2&nbsp;লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td><strong>নিচের বিক্রিয়াগুলোর জন্য কোষ সংকেত লেখ:&nbsp;</strong></td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm \left(i\right)\ Cu\left(s\right)/{\rm Cu}^{2+}\left(aq\right)||{\rm Ag}^+\left(aq\right)/Ag\left(s\right) \\ \left(ii\right)\ Zn\left(s\right)/ZnSO_4\left(aq\right)||H_2SO_4\left(aq\right)/H_2\left(g\right),\ Pt \\ \left(iii\right)\ Pt,\ \ Fe^{2+}\left(aq\right)/Fe^{3+}\left(aq\right)||Cl_2\left(g\right)/Cl^-\left(aq\right),\ Pt </script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong><br>
৩টি বিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ২.৫ নম্বর।<br>
২টি বিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ০২ নম্বর।<br>
১টি বিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>নিচের কোষটির জারণ-বিজারণ অর্ধবিক্রিয়া ও সামগ্রিক কোষ বিক্রিয়া লেখ এবং কোষ বিক্রিয়ার স্বতঃস্ফূর্ততা ব্যাখ্যা কর।</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

<p>বিজারণ অর্ধবিক্রিয়া:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="width: 8.65em; <p>সামগ্রিক বিক্রিয়া:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="width: 12.584em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1254"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1255"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Z</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\rm 2Al+3Zn^{2+}\rightarrow2Al^{3+}+3Zn\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1.66</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.76</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>0.9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="width: 25.33em; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1319" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1321"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.76</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1.66</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.76</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>0.9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm E_{cell}^o=E_{Al/Al^{3+}}^o+E_{Zn^{2+}/Zn}^o=-\left(-1.66\right)+\left(-0.76\right)=+0.9V</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1330"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">\therefore</script></span> কোষ বিক্রিয়া স্বতঃস্ফূর্ত হবে।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong><br>
জারণ অর্ধবিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ০.২৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
বিজারণ অর্ধবিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ০.২৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
সামগ্রিক বিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>0.9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="width: 5.904em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1333"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1334"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.11em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1337"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1338"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1339" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>0.9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\rm E_{cell}^o=+0.9V</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
কোষ বিক্রিয়া স্বতঃস্ফূর্ত হবে লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>(a) রাসায়নিক ফুড প্রিজারভেটিভস্ কী? (০১)<br>
			(b) নিম্নোক্ত রাসায়নিক ফুড প্রিজারভেটিভসমূহকে শ্রেণিভুক্ত কর:&nbsp;<br>
			বেনজয়িক এসিড, বিউটাইলেটেড হাইড্রক্সি টলুইন, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1347" style="width: 2.573em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.088em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.09em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1348"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1350"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.41em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1352"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1353"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1354" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm Fe^{3+}</script></span> আয়ন, ক্যালসিয়াম প্রোপানয়েট, ইথিলিন ডাই অ্যামিন। (১.৫)</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>(a) খাদ্য বস্তুর পচন রোধকরূপে ব্যবহৃত নির্দিষ্ট স্বল্প মাত্রার রাসায়নিক পদার্থসমূহই রাসায়নিক ফুড প্রিজারভেটিভস্&zwnj;।</p>

<p>(b) <strong>অ্যান্টিমাইক্রোবায়েল এজেন্ট: </strong>বেনজয়িক এসিড, ক্যালসিয়াম প্রোপানোয়েট&nbsp;<br>
<strong>অ্যান্টি অক্সিডেন্ট:</strong> বিউটাইলেটেড হাইড্রক্সি&nbsp;টলুইন<br>
<strong>কিলেটিং এজেন্ট: </strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="width: 2.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.72em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1357"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1359"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1361"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1362"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm Fe^{3+}</script></span> আয়ন, ইথিলিন ডাই অ্যামিন</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong><br>
(a) সংজ্ঞা লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
(b) অ্যান্টিমাইক্রোবায়েল এজেন্টগুলো লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
অ্যান্টি অক্সিডেন্টগুলো লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
কিলেটিং এজেন্টগুলো লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1666" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 1.027em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1667" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1670"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1671" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1003.4em, 4.182em, -999.998em); overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm tan3A=\frac{3tanA-\tan^3{A}}{1-3\tan^2{A}}]</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>20</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>40</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>80</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1850" style="width: 11.559em;                                         </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>একটি ত্রিভুজের বাহুত্রয়ের দৈর্ঘ্য 2, 3 ও 4 একক এবং পরিব্যাসার্ধ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>8</mn><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1877" style="width: 2.014em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1001.64em, 2.945em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1878"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1879"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1880" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.31em, 4.212em, -999.998em); top: -3.5em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.632em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1881"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.306em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.67em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.598em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1882"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1883" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">15</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.971em, 1000.71em, 1.194em, -999.998em); top: -1.675em; left: 0.598em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;
