clip: rect(3.318em, 1000.6em, 4.249em, -999.998em); top: -4.022em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1001.42em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.77em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.866em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>8</mn><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\frac{8}{\sqrt{15}}</script></span> একক হলে, অন্তঃব্যাসার্ধ নির্ণয় কর।</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>ত্রিভুজের ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1884" style="width: 8.568em; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1892"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1893" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p>এবং,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="width: 6.395em; <p>তাহলে, (i) হতে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1920" style="width: 6.273em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1943" style="width: 11.518em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1957" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.24em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.24em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1959" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1960" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1961" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1963" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1001.31em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1964"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1965"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">15</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.7em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\rm \Rightarrow r=\frac{2\times3\times\sqrt{15}}{8}\times\frac{2}{9}=\frac{\sqrt{15}}{6}</script></span>&nbsp;একক</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="width: 2.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.05em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1969"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1972" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1974" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">\rm s=\frac{9}{2}</script></span> একক ; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="width: 3.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1002.83em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1976"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1001.31em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1980"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1981"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">15</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.7em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1983" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</strong></p>

                            </div>

			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>

                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>.</mo><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2020" style="width: 13.322em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2060" style="width: 14.715em; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2105"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2106" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2107" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2108" style="font-size: 70.7%; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">\rm =\frac{cosBcosC-\cos(B+C)}{cosBcosC}=\frac{cosA-\cos(\pi-A)}{cosA}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2110" style="width: 16.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1013.77em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2111"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2113" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∵</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2115"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2116" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2117"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2118"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2120"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">C</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2133" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>∵</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm [\because\cos{\left(B+C\right)}=cosBcosC-sinBsinC]</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>.</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2144" style="width: 17.83em; padding-left: 0.289em;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2181" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2192" style="width: 13.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1010.66em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.641em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm tanB.tanC=\frac{cosBcosC-\cos(B+C)}{cosBcosC}</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;</strong>নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2231" style="width: 11.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1009.43em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2232"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2241" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2243" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.125em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1004.96em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.498em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2244"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2245" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2246" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2247" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2248" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2249" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2250" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2251" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2252" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2253" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2254" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2255" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2256" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.12em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2262" style="width: 6.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.084em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.04em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2263"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">\rm tanBtanC=2</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12</span>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2328" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2329"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2330" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2331"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2334" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1001.31em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2337"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2339"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.312em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">\rm a^2\left(\cos^2{B}-\cos^2{C}\right)+b^2\left(\cos^2{C}-\cos^2{A}\right)+c^2(\cos^2{A}-\cos^2{B})</script></span>&nbsp;এর মান নির্ণয় কর।</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2410" style="width: 38.117em; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2552" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2554" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2555"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2556" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2557"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\rm =a^2\left(\sin^2{C}-\sin^2{B}\right)+b^2\left(\sin^2{A}-\sin^2{C}\right)+c^2(\sin^2{B}-\sin^2{A})</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2560" style="width: 21.805em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2619" style="width: 22.01em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm a^2\left(\cos^2{B}-\cos^2{C}\right)+b^2\left(\cos^2{C}-\cos^2{A}\right)+c^2(\cos^2{A}-\cos^2{B})\\ =a^2\left(1-\sin^2{B}-1+\sin^2{C}\right)+b^2\left(1-\sin^2{C}-1+\sin^2{A}\right)+c^2(1-\sin^2{A}-1+\sin^2{B})\ ;</script></span>&nbsp;</strong>নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

-2.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\rm a^2\left(\cos^2{B}-\cos^2{C}\right)+b^2\left(\cos^2{C}-\cos^2{A}\right)+c^2(\cos^2{A}-\cos^2{B})\\=\frac{1}{4R^2}\ \left\{a^2\left(c^2-b^2\right)+b^2\left(a^2-c^2\right)+c^2\left(b^2-a^2\right)\right\}</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2947" style="width: 29.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1024.14em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2948"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2949"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2951" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2952" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2953" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2954"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2955"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2957" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2958"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2959" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2960"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2961" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2965" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2966"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2967" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2968"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2970" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2989"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2990" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2991"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2993" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2997" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2999"><span style="display: inline-block;
